meanings.definition: A tall post with a light at the top, typically found along streets or in public areas.
meanings.sent1: The lamppost illuminated the dark street.
meanings.sent2: I walked past the lamppost on my way home.
meanings.sent3: The lamppost told jokes to the passing cars.
meanings.sent4: She stood under the lamppost, a beacon of hope in the night.
meanings.sent5: The flickering lamppost cast eerie shadows on the sidewalk.
